speaker: Doctor
text: Can you tell me more about when these symptoms started? Was it sudden or did they develop gradually?

speaker: Patient
text: "To be honest, Doctor, they all started around the same time, about four weeks ago. I remember it was just a normal day, and then I woke up with this weird feeling in my belly, and it's been that way ever since. It's been getting worse, though."

speaker: Doctor
text: When did you first notice these symptoms - fatigue, abdominal pain, night sweats, weight loss, and the enlargement of your supraclavicular lymph node - was it a gradual change or did it start suddenly?
